name: StackFortress
description: A unique tower defense game. Where you design and build your defense block by block. With many component that can be combined for different effect. To survive in a hostile world.
minimum_requirements: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system OS: Window 7 or Later Processor: 1.8GHz single core Memory: 4096 MB RAM Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 560 / AMD Radeon HD 7790 DirectX: Version 12 Storage: 1000 MB available space
recommended_requirements: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
